titles.title: Unsolicited Loan Act of 2018

A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit the distribution of any check or other negotiable instrument as part of a solicitation by a creditor for an extension of credit, to limit the liability of consumers in conjunction with such solicitations, and for other purposes.
Unsolicited Loan Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Unsolicited Loan Act of 2018
This bill prohibits a lender from providing an unsolicited loan check to a consumer.
